Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is the official skill to command all fireplaces with Proflame Connect Plus control embedded. You can use your Proflame Plus account to control auxiliary, led, timer, flame and lamp of your fireplace by voice (when activating the skill you will be asked to log in with your Proflame account so that Alexa can retrieve the list of fireplaces associated with it). Below is a list of possible commands:

 • Alexa turn on fireplace
 • Alexa turn off fireplace
 • Alexa turn on aux on fireplace
 • Alexa turn off aux on fireplace
 • Alexa turn on led on fireplace
 • Alexa turn off led on fireplace
 • Alexa set fireplace led intensity to 50
 • Alexa set fireplace counter to 120
 • Alexa set counter status of fireplace to start
 • Alexa set counter status of fireplace to pause
 • Alexa set counter status of fireplace to stop
 • Alexa set fireplace flame intensity to 2
 • Alexa turn on lamp on fireplace
 • Alexa turn off lamp on fireplace
 • Alexa set fireplace lamp intensity to 3

In the previous commands "fireplace" must be replaced with the name given to the fireplace itself. Furthermore, some commands may not be present on your fireplace: check the booklet to find out about the available features. Finally, some commands could be inhibited if the fireplace is off.

Welcome and good hands-free use of the fireplace!
